text:
The approval process for the @Novavax #vaccine has been faster in the #UK than in the #EU, as it has been with other #vaccines. 
Why has it been so slow? And how should we press the @EMA_News to move forward?

🗣️ ECR MEP @AlexandrVondra | @EP_Environment @EP_Industry #COVID19 https://t.co/iowbMEVo9i
